verses.verse: From the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> I will <S%H7121>call<s%> to <S%H3820>you,<s%> when my heart is <S%H5848>overwhelmed.<s%> <S%H5148>Lead<s%> me to the <S%H6697>rock<s%> that is higher than <S%H7311>I.<s%>
For you have been a <S%H4268>refuge<s%> for <S%H5797>me,<s%> a strong <S%H4026>tower<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H341>enemy.<s%>
I will <S%H1481>dwell<s%> in your <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%> I will take <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in the <S%H5643>shelter<s%> of your <S%H3671>wings.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
For <S%H430>you,<s%> God, have <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H5088>vows.<s%> You have <S%H5414>given<s%> me the <S%H3425>heritage<s%> of those who <S%H3373>fear<s%> your <S%H8034>name.<s%>
You will <S%H3254>prolong<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H3117>life;<s%> his <S%H8141>years<s%> shall be <S%H1755>for<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

He shall be <S%H3427>enthroned<s%> <S%H6440>in<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>'s <S%H6440>presence<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%> Appoint your loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> and <S%H571>truth,<s%> that they may preserve <S%H5341>him.<s%>
So I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> praise to your <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5703>forever,<s%> that I may <S%H7999>fulfill<s%> my <S%H5088>vows<s%> <S%H3117>daily.<s%>
